name: Spikefall (steria773)
description:
Welcome to Spikefall!

Spikefall is survival game that locks you into room filled with moving Spikes!

Gameplay

The game takes inspiration from Undertale's Megalovania but here it's more harder, You try to survive moving spikes while being locked into room.

Move the player with arrow keys and try to not collide with spikes, Survive for longest time possible...

Development

I used DragonRuby Game Toolkit which utilizes Ruby in amazing way powered by SDL and mruby!

Coin sound grapped from freesound but other sounds made using Bfxr. All third party content info/licenses/credits can be seen here

The game is open-source and source code could be found here

Donations?

Donations is an option to support my work if you care about,
